overview: Brian Niessen has been a software architect, developer, and security consultant for 20 years. His experience includes major projects in e-commerce, online banking, online gaming systems, search applications, and virtual worlds. Mr. Niessen is competent in authentication systems, programming in C, Perl, Basic, Assembler, HTML, and numerous other languages. As an example, Mr. Niessen was developer of software and systems and startup and operations manager for TV Ruleta, a Czech Republic national televised lottery sponsored by the Nissan Motor Company.
